exam.question: Movie directors use music to ______ the action on the screen.

answer.explain: 句意： 电影导演使用音乐来配合银幕上的表演。con-taminate： 污染； compliment： 称赞， 恭维； contemplate： 凝视； 沉思。

sentences.sContent: The green wallpaper is the perfect complement to the old pine of the dresser.
sentences.sCn: 绿色墙纸是旧松木梳妆台的完美衬托。

sentences.sContent: ...e-learning should be seen as a complement but not a replacement of traditional classes...

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ ple(满， 填满) ＋ ment → 互为补充的东西

trans.tranCn: 补充，互为补充的东西；编制名额；装备定额；补语['kɒmplɪm3nt]
trans.tranOther: someone or something that emphasizes the good qualities of another person or thing
to make a good combination with someone or something else
